nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Rebels to the Rescue!

Star Wars Rebels: Rebels to the Rescue! is an activity book written by Brian Houlihan and released by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. on January 1, 2015. It uses stills from episodes of Star Wars Rebels as illustration.
Rebels to the Rescue! Ezra and the rebels need your help! Turn the steering wheel while you read to drive a speeder, a walker, and Ghost. 3+ yrs. and up.
